comments:
I20070815-1600

While a full build was taking place (after I had to kill Eclipse), I switched the Problems view from Group By > Type to Group By > Severity.

The Problems view took a long time to update (UI not blocked), and shortly before the new grouping was shown, I got the CCE below (looks similar to bug 133059).

Is reproducible.
